Uses of Interface
org.apache.ignite.MemoryMetrics

  • Packages that use MemoryMetrics 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite
    Contains entry-point Ignite & HPC APIs.
    org.apache.ignite.mxbean
    Contains annotations for Dynamic MBeans.

    • Uses of MemoryMetrics in org.apache.ignite

      Classes in org.apache.ignite that implement MemoryMetrics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DataRegionMetricsAdapter
      Converter class from DataRegionMetrics to legacy MemoryMetrics.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite that return MemoryMetrics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MemoryMetrics IgniteSpringBean.memoryMetrics(String memPlcName)
      MemoryMetrics Ignite.memoryMetrics(String memPlcName)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Ignite.dataRegionMetrics(String) instead.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite that return types with arguments of type MemoryMetrics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Collection<MemoryMetrics> DataRegionMetricsAdapter.collectionOf(Collection<DataRegionMetrics> dataRegionMetrics)
      Converts collection of DataRegionMetrics into collection of legacy MemoryMetrics.
      Collection<MemoryMetrics> IgniteSpringBean.memoryMetrics()
      Collection<MemoryMetrics> Ignite.memoryMetrics()
      Deprecated. 
      Use Ignite.dataRegionMetrics() instead.

      Subinterfaces of MemoryMetrics in org.apache.ignite.mxbean 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MemoryMetricsMXBean
      Deprecated. 
      Part of old API. Metrics are accessible through DataRegionMetricsMXBean.
